components: STEERING,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,SEAT BELTS,LATCHES/LOCKS/LINKAGES
summary: FROM WHAT THEY SAY, MY TIMING BELT CAME OFF AND TOOK OUT THE ENGINE. I ALSO HAD PROBLEMS WITH THE POWER LOCKS GOING OUT AT THE SAME TIME, THE STEERING WAS STARTING TO GO OUT AND THE CAM SENSOR WENT OUT.  *NLM
